text: Marie-Chantal Depetris-Demaille (17 December 1941 â€“ 18 February 2025) was a French foil fencer. She competed at the 1964, 1968, and 1972 Summer Olympics. She also competed at the 1971 Mediterranean Games where she won a gold medal. Deptris-Demaiile also won gold in the same event at the 1971 World Fencing Championships. Depetris-Demaille died on 18 February 2025, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2025 deaths Category:French fencers
title: Marie-Chantal Depetris-Demaille
